forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 43F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low near 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 3C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 37F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 8C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 46F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 34F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 51F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.
